content: There are mothers and fathers who will lie awake after the children fall asleep and wonder how they'll make the mortgage, or pay their doctor's bills, or save enough for their child's college education.
translations: ita:Ci sono madri e padri che rimarranno a letto svegli dopo che i figli si addormenteranno e si chiederanno come ripagheran
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by CM (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
